title: Transfer Talk: Hold up for Alexis Sanchez?
description: The seventh episode of Transfer Talk is available to download now!
content: Host Pete Graves was joined in the studio by Spanish football expert Guillem Balague and Sky Sports News Chief News Reporter Bryan Swanson to chat about the latest moves in the transfer market.The panel discuss what is holding up the swap deal involving Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez and Manchester United midfielder Henrikh Mkhitaryan.Click here to listen and subscribe via iTunes.Guillem also provides updates on the futures of Real Madrid forward Cristiano Ronaldo and Liverpool forward Daniel Sturridge.Meanwhile, Bryan brings us up to speed on those behind Chelsea's transfer strategy following the departure of technical director Michael Emenalo.Click here to listen to the Transfer Talk podcast.If all that was not enough, Sky Sports News North East reporter Keith Downie graced the podcast with his presence to discuss the transfer lines from a host of Premier League manager conferences.Keith also provides an update on whether a takeover deal can be resurrected at Newcastle and the panel answer your transfer questions.
